meanings.definition: People who do not have children.
meanings.sent1: Many nonparents enjoy traveling and exploring the world.
meanings.sent2: The park was filled with families and nonparents alike.
meanings.sent3: The nonparents at the party were the life of the gathering, telling jokes and stories.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of parents, the nonparents stood out like bright stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The nonparents formed a close-knit community, supporting each other through thick and thin.

meanings.definition: The state of not being parents.
meanings.sent1: The nonparents in the group shared a bond over their similar life choices.
meanings.sent2: There was a mix of parents and nonparents at the neighborhood meeting.
meanings.sent3: The nonparents celebrated their freedom by going on spontaneous road trips.
meanings.sent4: The nonparents embraced their independence like a warm blanket on a cold night.
meanings.sent5: The nonparents' peaceful home was a sanctuary away from the chaos of parenthood.
